section.title: Work dividing
section.para: My work was to create basic structure of the project, and implement a program that will get information(period of time) and will generate a new DocBook standartized file to be generated in an understandable form.

section.title: Resources
section.para: To make a project structure was created UseCase, Class and EntityRelation diagrams by the means of UML.
For easy work with files was used dom4j library.

section.title: Implementation
section.para: At first was created a model of the project, and interfaces according to it. Then was created a classes for generating xml and it's converting, also it includes compatibility features. Finally was done a web page for generating PDF file.
